title: Kowarekake no Omocha
sinopse:
1. Kowarekake no Omocha (A Toy with Sadness)
2. Hako no Naka no Omocha
3. Kinjirareta Omocha
4. Yumemiru Koro wo Sugite mo (Even Beyond Dreams)
5. Taiyou no Playboy (Sun's Playboy)
6. Kamihitoe no Daikirai (Paper-Thin Loathing)
7. Nakanaka Sunao ni Narenakute (Communication is still an issue)
